# lares

### Lean Analytics and Robust Exploration Sidekick

[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/laresbernardo/lares/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/laresbernardo/lares/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version-ago/lares)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=lares)
[![](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/lares)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=lares)
[![docs](https://github.com/laresbernardo/lares/workflows/documentation/badge.svg)](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/index.html)
[![CodeFactor](https://www.codefactor.io/repository/github/laresbernardo/lares/badge)](https://www.codefactor.io/repository/github/laresbernardo/lares/overview/main)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**lares** is an R package designed to automate, improve, and accelerate
everyday **analytics and machine learning** tasks. It offers a wide
variety of functions grouped in families for:

- **Machine Learning**: Streamlined model training and evaluation,
  including friendly AutoML pipelines.
- **Data Cleaning & Processing**: Functions to quickly prepare your data
  for modeling or analyzes.
- **Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)**: Instantly visualize and summarize
  your data.
- **Reporting**: Easily generate comprehensive reports to share insights
  for MMM and ML models.
- **Visualization**: Out-of-the-box plotting for classification and
  regression models, timelines, and more.
- **API Integrations & Scrapers**: Simplify data collection from various
  sources.
- **Time Series & Portfolio Analysis**: Specialized utilities for
  financial and temporal data.
- **Credentials & Secrets Management**: Securely handle sensitive
  information in your analytics pipelines.
- **NLP & Text Analytics**: Tools to analyze and process text data.

> **Tip:** See all available functions and documentation
> [here](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/index.html) or
> type `?lares::` in RStudio to explore interactively.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

``` r
# CRAN VERSION
install.packages("lares")

# DEV VERSION (latest updates)
# If you don't have remotes installed yet, run: install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github("laresbernardo/lares")
# For a full installation with recommended dependencies:
remotes::install_github("laresbernardo/lares", dependencies = TRUE)
```

**Windows users:** You may need to install
[RTools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/) to build the
dev version.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Read about `lares` in action!

- **AutoML Quickstart:** [Introduction to AutoML using
  `lares`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/articles/h2o_automl.html)
- **Model Results Visualization:**
  [Classification](https://datascienceplus.com/machine-learning-results-one-plot-to-rule-them-all/)
  \|
  [Regression](https://datascienceplus.com/machine-learning-results-in-r-one-plot-to-rule-them-all-part-2-regression-models/)
- **Marketing Mix Model Selection:** [Select the right MMM
  candidate](https://medium.com/@laresbernardo/select-the-right-mmm-candidate-based-on-your-specific-criteria-and-business-knowledge-1f583c3cb97a)
- **Cross-Correlations:** [Find Insights with Ranked
  Cross-Correlations](https://datascienceplus.com/find-insights-with-ranked-cross-correlations/)
- **Secure Credentials:** [Manage Secrets in
  R](https://datascienceplus.com/how-to-manage-credentials-and-secrets-safely-in-r/)
- **Portfolio Analysis:** [Performance &
  Reporting](https://datascienceplus.com/visualize-your-portfolios-performance-and-generate-a-nice-report-with-r/)
- **Fun games**:
  [Wordle](https://datascienceplus.com/how-i-selected-my-starting-word-for-wordle-using-simulations-and-r/),
  [Scrabble](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/scrabble.html),
  [Sudoku](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/sudoku_solver.html),
  [Mazes](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/maze_solve.html),
  etc.
- **More Examples:** [Read other
  posts](https://datascienceplus.com/author/bernardo-lares/)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Popular Functions

- [`h2o_automl()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_automl.md),
  [`mplot_full()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/mplot_full.md)
  – Automated machine learning pipeline with optimal model selection and
  visualizations.
- [`freqs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/freqs.md),
  [`distr()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/distr.md),
  [`corr_var()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr_var.md),
  [`corr_cross()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr_cross.md)
  – Instantly summarize, visualize, and uncover relationships in your
  data.
- [`ohse()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ohse.md) –
  Efficient and smart one-hot encoding for categorical variables.
- `cache_*` – Speed up workflows by caching expensive computations.
- `robyn_*` – Additional functions to support
  [Robyn](https://github.com/facebookexperimental/Robyn) inputs and
  outputs.
- `fb_*` – Interact with Meta’s Marketing API
- `gpt_*` – Structured prompts builder and interact with OpenAI’s API
- [`read_encrypted()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md),
  [`write_encrypted()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  – Interact with encrypted files to keep secrets safe
- …and [many
  more!](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/index.html)

![AutoML Map (lares)](reference/figures/automl_map.png?raw=true)

AutoML Map (lares)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Getting Started & Help

- Browse all functions in the [online
  reference](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/index.html).
- Use `?lares::function_name` in RStudio for detailed help on any
  function.
- Found a bug or have a feature request? [Open an
  issue](https://github.com/laresbernardo/lares/issues).
- For questions or suggestions, reach out to
  [laresbernardo](mailto:laresbernardo@gmail.com).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`ROC()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ROC.md) :
  AUC and ROC Curves Data
- [`autoline()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/autoline.md)
  : New Line Feed for Long Strings (Wrapper)
- [`balance_data()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/balance_data.md)
  : Balance Binary Data by Resampling: Under-Over Sampling
- [`bind_files()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/bind_files.md)
  : Bind Files into Dataframe
- [`bring_api()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/bring_api.md)
  : Get API (JSON) and Transform into data.frame
- [`cache_write()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cache_write.md)
  [`cache_read()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cache_write.md)
  [`cache_exists()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cache_write.md)
  [`cache_clear()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cache_write.md)
  [`cache_pipe()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cache_write.md)
  : Cache Save and Load (Write and Read)
- [`categ_reducer()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/categ_reducer.md)
  : Reduce categorical values
- [`check_opts()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`check_attr()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`is_url()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`is_ip()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`are_id()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`are_constant()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`are_binary()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`is_even()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  [`is_odd()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/checks.md)
  : Validate inputs (attributions, options, ...)
- [`chr2num()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/chr2num.md)
  [`chr2logical()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/chr2num.md)
  [`chr2date()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/chr2num.md)
  : Check character values for date/numeric/logical and change datatype
- [`ci_lower()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ci_lower.md)
  [`ci_upper()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ci_lower.md)
  : Lower/Upper Confidence Intervals
- [`ci_var()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ci_var.md)
  : Confidence Intervals on Dataframe
- [`cleanText()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/clean_text.md)
  [`cleanNames()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/clean_text.md)
  : Clean text strings automatically
- [`clusterKmeans()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/clusterKmeans.md)
  : Automated K-Means Clustering + PCA/t-SNE
- [`clusterOptimalK()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/clusterOptimalK.md)
  : Visualize K-Means Clusters for Several K Methods
- [`clusterVisualK()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/clusterVisualK.md)
  : Visualize K-Means Clusters for Several K
- [`conf_mat()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/conf_mat.md)
  : Confussion Matrix
- [`corr()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr.md) :
  Correlation table
- [`corr_cross()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr_cross.md)
  : Ranked cross-correlation across all variables
- [`corr_var()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr_var.md)
  [`plot(`*`<corr_var>`*`)`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/corr_var.md)
  : Correlation between variable and dataframe
- [`cran_logs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/cran_logs.md)
  : Download and plot daily downloads of CRAN packages
- [`crosstab()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/crosstab.md)
  : Weighted Cross Tabulation
- [`dalex_local()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dalex_local.md)
  : DALEX Local
- [`dalex_residuals()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dalex_residuals.md)
  : DALEX Residuals
- [`dalex_variable()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dalex_variable.md)
  : DALEX Partial Dependency Plots (PDP)
- [`date_cuts()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/date_cuts.md)
  : Convert Date into Year + Cut
- [`date_feats()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/date_feats.md)
  : One Hot Encoding for Date/Time Variables (Dummy Variables)
- [`db_download()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/db_download.md)
  : Download/Import Dropbox File by File's Name
- [`db_upload()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/db_upload.md)
  : Upload Local Files to Dropbox
- [`df_str()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/df_str.md)
  : Dataset columns and rows structure
- [`dfr`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dfr.md) :
  Results for AutoML Predictions
- [`dft`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dft.md) :
  Titanic Dataset
- [`dist2d()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dist2d.md)
  : Distance from specific point to line
- [`distr()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/distr.md)
  : Compare Variables with their Distributions
- [`dont_sleep()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dont_sleep.md)
  [`dont_sleep_time()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/dont_sleep.md)
  : Prevent Computer from Sleeping by Simulating Mouse Activity
- [`encrypt_file()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  [`read_encrypted()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  [`write_encrypted()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  [`hex_to_raw()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  [`raw_to_hex()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/encrypt_file.md)
  : File Encryption and Decryption (AES-256-CBC)
- [`errors()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`rmse()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`mae()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`mse()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`mape()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`rsq()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  [`rsqa()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/errors.md)
  : Calculate Continuous Values Errors
- [`etf_sector()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/etf_sector.md)
  : ETF's Sectors Breakdown
- [`export_plot()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/export_plot.md)
  : Export ggplot2, gridExtra, or any plot object into rendered file
- [`export_results()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/export_results.md)
  : Export h2o_automl's Results
- [`fb_accounts()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_accounts.md)
  : Facebook Ad Accounts
- [`fb_ads()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_ads.md)
  : Facebook Ads API
- [`fb_creatives()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_creatives.md)
  : Facebook Creatives API
- [`fb_insights()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_insights.md)
  : Facebook Insights API
- [`fb_process()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_process.md)
  : Paginate and Process Facebook's API Results
- [`fb_report_check()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_report_check.md)
  : Facebook API Report Status Check
- [`fb_rf()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_rf.md)
  : Facebook Reach and Frequency API
- [`fb_token()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/fb_token.md)
  : Facebook's Long-Life User API Token
- [`file_name()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/file_name.md)
  [`file_type()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/file_name.md)
  : Extract file raw name and type from file names
- [`filesGD()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/filesGD.md)
  : Google Drive Files (API v4)
- [`files_functions()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/files_functions.md)
  : List all functions used in R script files by package
- [`removenacols()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/filterdata.md)
  [`removenarows()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/filterdata.md)
  [`numericalonly()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/filterdata.md)
  : Remove/Drop Columns in which ALL or SOME values are NAs
- [`font_exists()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/font_exists.md)
  : Check if Font is Installed
- [`forecast_arima()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/forecast_arima.md)
  : ARIMA Forecast
- [`formatColoured()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/formatColoured.md)
  : Print Coloured Messages
- [`formatHTML()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/format_string.md)
  [`formatNum()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/format_string.md)
  : Format a string text as markdown/HTML
- [`freqs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/freqs.md)
  : Frequencies Calculations and Plot
- [`freqs_df()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/freqs_df.md)
  : Plot for All Frequencies on Dataframe
- [`freqs_list()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/freqs_list.md)
  : Frequencies on Lists and UpSet Plot
- [`freqs_plot()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/freqs_plot.md)
  : Combined Frequencies Plot for Categorical Features
- [`gain_lift()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gain_lift.md)
  : Cumulative Gain, Lift and Response
- [`gemini_ask()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gemini_ask.md)
  [`gemini_image()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gemini_ask.md)
  : Gemini API Interaction with R
- [`get_credentials()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/get_credentials.md)
  [`get_creds()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/get_credentials.md)
  : Load Credentials from a YML File
- [`get_currency()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/get_currency.md)
  : Download Historical Currency Exchange Rate
- [`get_tweets()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/get_tweets.md)
  : Get Tweets
- [`gg_fill_customs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gg_fill_customs.md)
  [`gg_colour_customs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gg_fill_customs.md)
  [`gg_text_customs()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gg_fill_customs.md)
  [`gg_vals()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gg_fill_customs.md)
  : Custom fill, colour and text colours for ggplot2
- [`glued()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/glued.md)
  : Interpolate a string \[glue wrapper\]
- [`readGS()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/google_sheets.md)
  [`writeGS()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/google_sheets.md)
  : Google Sheets Reading and Writing (API v4)
- [`gtrends_related()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/google_trends.md)
  [`gtrends_time()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/google_trends.md)
  : Google Trends: Related and Time Plots
- [`gpt_ask()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_history()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_table()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_classify()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_tag()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_extract()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_format()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_convert()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  [`gpt_translate()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_ask.md)
  : ChatGPT API Interaction with R
- [`gpt_prompter()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/gpt_prompter.md)
  : Structured Prompt Builder for LLM (ChatGPT)
- [`grepl_letters()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/grepl_letters.md)
  : Pattern Matching for Letters considering Blanks
- [`grepm()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/grepm.md)
  : Pattern Matching for Any or All Multiple Matches
- [`h2o_automl()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_automl.md)
  [`plot(`*`<h2o_automl>`*`)`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_automl.md)
  [`print(`*`<h2o_automl>`*`)`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_automl.md)
  : Automated H2O's AutoML
- [`h2o_explainer()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_explainer.md)
  : DALEX Explainer for H2O
- [`h2o_predict_MOJO()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_predict.md)
  [`h2o_predict_binary()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_predict.md)
  [`h2o_predict_model()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_predict.md)
  [`h2o_predict_API()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_predict.md)
  : Calculate predictions of h2o Models
- [`h2o_results()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_results.md)
  : Automated H2O's AutoML Results
- [`h2o_selectmodel()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_selectmodel.md)
  : Select Model from h2o_automl's Leaderboard
- [`h2o_shap()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_shap.md)
  [`plot(`*`<h2o_shap>`*`)`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/h2o_shap.md)
  : SHAP values for H2O Models
- [`haveInternet()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/haveInternet.md)
  : Internet Connection Check
- [`holidays()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/holidays.md)
  : Holidays in your Country
- [`image_metadata()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/image_metadata.md)
  : Get Meta Data from Image Files
- [`importxlsx()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/importxlsx.md)
  : Import Excel File with All Its Tabs
- [`impute()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/impute.md)
  : Impute Missing Values (using MICE)
- [`install_recommended()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/install_recommended.md)
  : Install/Update Additional Recommended Libraries
- [`ip_data()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/ip_data.md)
  : Scrap data based on IP address
- [`iter_seeds()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/iter_seeds.md)
  : Iterate Seeds on AutoML
- [`json2vector()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/json2vector.md)
  : Convert Python JSON string to R vector (data.frame with 1 row)
- [`lares-exports`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares-exports.md)
  [`%>%`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares-exports.md)
  : Pipe operator
- [`lares-package`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares.md)
  [`lares`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares.md) :
  Lean Analytics and Robust Exploration Sidekick
- [`lares_logo()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares_logo.md)
  : Print lares R library Logo
- [`lares_pal()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lares_pal.md)
  : Personal Colours Palette
- [`lasso_vars()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/lasso_vars.md)
  : Most Relevant Features Using Lasso Regression
- [`left()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/left_right.md)
  [`right()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/left_right.md)
  : Left or Right N characters of a string
- [`list_cats()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/list_cats.md)
  : List categorical values for data.frame
- [`listfiles()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/listfiles.md)
  : List files in a directory
- [`loglossBinary()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/loglossBinary.md)
  : Logarithmic Loss Function for Binary Models
- [`mail_send()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/mail_send.md)
  : Send Emails with Attachments (POST)
- [`markdown2df()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/markdown2df.md)
  : Convert markdown string tables to data.frame
- [`maze_solve()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/maze_solve.md)
  [`print(`*`<maze_solve>`*`)`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/maze_solve.md)
  [`maze_gridsearch()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/maze_solve.md)
  : Maze Solver, inspired by Micromouse competitions
- [`missingness()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/missingness.md)
  : Calculate and Visualize Missingness
- [`model_metrics()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/model_metrics.md)
  : Model Metrics and Performance
- [`model_preprocess()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/model_preprocess.md)
  : Automate Data Preprocess for Modeling
- [`move_files()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/move_files.md)
  : Move files from A to B
- [`mp3_get()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/mp3_get.md)
  : Download MP3 from URL
- [`mp3_trim()`](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/reference/mp3_trim.md)
  : Trim MP3 Audio File

  : Update MP3 Metadata Tags

  : Confussion Matrix Plot

  : Cuts by quantiles for score plot

  : Cuts by quantiles on absolute and percentual errors plot

  : Density plot for discrete and continuous values

  : MPLOTS Score Full Report Plots

  : Cumulative Gain Plot

  : Split a dataframe for training and testing sets

  What's my IP?

  : Build N-grams and keep most frequent

  : Plot Result with Nothing to Plot

  : Normalize Vector

  : Abbreviate or dis-abbreviate numerical values

  One Hot Smart Encoding (Dummy Variables)

  Learning](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/articles/machine-learning.md):

  Enhancers](https://laresbernardo.github.io/lares/articles/robyn_lares.md):
